cards.title: self-taught
cards.text: I'm a person who loves learning new technologies and doing projects with said technologies.

cards.title: ITLA
cards.text: It's the most prestigious institute in my country in terms of technology and here I took the software development technology

cards.title: Talendig Bootcamp
cards.text: I took this bootcamp because I wanted to learn more about web development and here I learned HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Node and more

cards.title: Platzi
cards.text: I do the web development school in this platform, where learned Fundamentals HTML, CSS, Javascript also React and Node

cards.title: FreeCodeCamp
cards.text: I decided to take a few bootcamps on this platform because of its prestige and took Web Responsive Design, Javascript Algorithms and Data Structures and Backend Development and Apis
